Title: SCHEME
Values: Accumulate profit constantly in any way
Actually a front for a criminal organization (`/matrix faction criminals`)
Agency says "jump," we say "how high" (`/matrix faction agency`)
All but openly purchase a small town
Burn evidence of an escaped experiment (`/matrix enemy experiment`)
Commodify a resource available for free
Convince their workers they're not exploited
Corporation is a front to find an artifact (`/matrix lore artifact`)
Deploy their squad without oversight (`/matrix enemy squad`)
Destabilize the economy of a city (`/matrix location city`)
Exploit a top-secret anomalous zone (`/matrix location zone`)
Fully automate a task with robots (`/matrix enemy robot`)
Go bankrupt on purpose to start over fresh
Hide worker deaths caused by mismanagement
Hook workers on drugs (and pay them in drugs)
Ignore a disaster caused by cost-cutting (`/matrix lore disaster`)
Illegally merge with another corporation (`/matrix faction corporation` again)
Indoctrinate workers into company cult (`/matrix faction cult`)
Introduce a bad product to boost the old product
Lab test on captive animals (`/matrix enemy animal`)
Limit a resource so they can price gouge for it
Manipulate markets by funding insurgents (`/matrix faction insurgents`)
No scheme, just doing a lot of coke
Pay off a politician to establish new laws (`/matrix character politician`)
Poach a scientist from a rival organization (`/matrix character scientist`)
Purchase and convert a structure (`/matrix location structure`)
Replace their workforce with an army of clones
Research and develop from an anomaly (`/matrix enemy anomaly`)
Sell the Earth wholesale to invading aliens (`/matrix faction aliens`)
Sue a civilian for copyright infringement (`/matrix character civilian`)
Turn a celebrity into their spokesperson (`/matrix character celebrity`)
Upper management is all monsters (`/matrix enemy monster`)
